large_project.prompt: Go into more details about why this can be considered a large project...

public_safety.prompt: Let's go more into detail on what makes it fall under the public safety category...

citizen_impact.prompt: Let's go more into detail on what makes it impactful on citizens...

children.prompt: Go more into detail, explain what the children's involvement is.

drug_cartel.prompt: Explain the involvement of one or more drug cartels in these construction application documents

identification.prompt: Assess the newsworth of the given text, consider the context and details given. Return a simple NOT NEWSWORTHY or NEWSWORTHY based on your assessment.
